casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tracy Glen SMITH. No. 534P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina.

December 5. 2008.

Kevin P. Bradley, Durham, for Smith. *904C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ____, 668 S.E.2d 612.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of December 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of December 2008."
